component.description: Breadcrumb is a navigation component that provides contextual information about page hierarchy in the workflow.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
model false org.primefaces.model.MenuModel MenuModel instance to create menus programmatically.
expandedEndItems false java.lang.Integer 1 Number of expanded menutitems at the end. Default is 1.
expandedBeginningItems false java.lang.Integer 1 Number of expanded menuitems at begining. Default is 1.
expandEffectDuration false java.lang.Integer 800 Expanded effect duration in milliseconds. Default is 800.
collapseEffectDuration false java.lang.Integer 500 Collapse effect duration in milliseconds. Default is 500.
initialCollapseEffectDuration false java.lang.Integer 600 Initial collapse effect duration in milliseconds. Default is 600.
previewWidth false java.lang.Integer 5 Preview width of a collapsed menuitem. Default is 5.
preview false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies preview mode, when set to false menuitems will not collapse. Default is false.
style false java.lang.String Style of main container element.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of main container.
